                  Residence Hall Policies                       The On Campus Experience                       Staff                       Our Goals                       About Us & Contact Us                       Dining                       Housing Services                                                                   Dining                                  Dining Information        All first-year students living in Washington Square (WSQ) Traditional Style residence halls (including Founders, Hayden, Brittany, Goddard, Rubin, and Weinstein) must maintain a minimum meal plan of 225 Flex meals per semester. Freshmen residents of WSQ Apartment Style halls, which are equipped with kitchens, must maintain a minimum of 113 Flex meals per semester.   All first-year Brooklyn residents of Othmer Hall, assigned to Traditional Style suites, will be automatically assigned the Othmer 1242 plan; first-year residents of Clark Hall will be automatically assigned the Clark 620 plan.   Following the meal plan cancellation/change deadline, students may add dining dollars by accessing the Meal Plan Portal . Charges for additional dining dollars will be added to students' Bursar accounts. Meal plan changes and cancellation requests must be submitted through the online form.     For more information about Manhattan meal plan features including hours of operation and cancellation/change deadlines please refer to the WSQ Dining Services website .   For more information about Brooklyn meal plan features including hours of operation and cancellation/change deadlines please refer to the School of Engineering Dining Services webpage .     Contact NYU Dining   NYU Washington Square Dining is provided through a contractual arrangement with the Aramark Corporation.   NYU Dining Services  238 Thompson Street, room 362  New York, NY 10012  212-998-4279   dining.services@nyu.edu   NYU Brooklyn Dining is provided through a contractual arrangement with the Lackmann Corporation.   Jasper Kane Dining Hall  NYU Polytechnic School of Engineering  Six MetroTech Center  Brooklyn, NY 11201   nyudining.services-brooklyn@nyu.edu                             NYU Dining Guide   Click here to learn about our different meal plan options   Sign Up!   Resident and Non-Resident students who wish to sign up for a meal plan or add dining dollars to their account may do so through the Meal Plan Portal.        Dining Locations   NYU Brooklyn:   Jasper Kane & Jasper Connection Dining Halls  NYU Polytechnic School of Engineering  Six MetroTech Center  Brooklyn, NY 11201            NYU Washington Square:     Argo Tea  239 Green Street (Inside the ARC)  at Washington Place  New York, NY 10004   Dunkin Donuts  University Hall  110 East 14th St.  New York, NY 10003   Market Place at Kimmel  60 Washington Square Park South  3rd Floor   Palladium Lifeworks  140 East 14th St. 3rd Fl  New York, NY 10003   Peet's Coffee & Tea  60 Washington Square South 2nd Fl  New York, NY 10012   Sidestein  11 University Place Ground Level  New York, NY 10003   Starbuck's At Fayes  45 West 4th Street  New York, NY 10003   Third North Courtyard Cafe  75 Third Avenue  New York, NY 10003   UHall Commons Cafe  110 East 14th st. (inside of U-Hall Commons)  New York, NY 10003     Weinstein Food Court  11 University Place Ground Level  New York, NY 10003   Weinstein Passport Dining  11 University Place  New York, NY 10003                                            NYU Footer          Search      Directory      Campus Map      Events      Contact Us      Site Map      Copyright and Fair Use      Feedback         Unless otherwise noted, all content copyright New York University. Over the years, there have been significant changes to the program, based on the ideas and comments from the most valued resource of all – the customers! The NYU Dining Services team continually reaches out to students for their input on updating and improving menu selections in order to provide diners with the most creative and high-quality dining experience possible. NYU Dining Services will also work with students individually who have special dietary requirements.                                                                 Washington Square                                        NYU Dining Services - Washington Square   NYU Dining Services - Washington Square and ARAMARK Higher Education have worked together for over thirty-five years to provide students and the University Community a broad selection of meal plans to suit everyone's needs.     NYU Dining Services - Washington Square offers flexible dining hours and convenient locations at the many newly-designed dining rooms and cafés that meet the demands of busy student schedules. Aside from fulfilling day-to-day dining needs, NYU Dining also creates special occasion events and international menus to celebrate holidays during the academic year.                                                              Brooklyn                                        NYU Dining Services - Brooklyn   NYU Dining Services - Brooklyn and Lackmann Culinary Services have joined forces to offer flexible meal plans that fits a student's busy schedule and stays within their budget.   NYU Dining Services - Brooklyn offers a variety of dining options and convenient hours, where students can connect, refuel and save time and money with any of the meal plan options. Whether you are studying or between classes, stop by Jasper Kane Dining Center or the Jasper Connection for a great meal, beverage or snack.                                                            2014-2015 Dining Guide                                        2014-2015 Dining Guide   Download our 2014-2015 Dining Guide now! It is your guide to everything happening at NYU Dining. Discover the many features and options that our flex meal plans offer. Use the easy to follow maps to locate all of our 15 dining locations. Inside the dining guide you will find information on health and nutrition, NYU dining special events and the dining calendar. Use our guide as a tool to help you satisfy your dining needs.             Catering    NYU Dining Services offers catering and delivery services operating exclusively for the University community. The excellent food and great convenience are perfect for any event: from professional meetings, lunches and dinners to sit-down affairs of over 300 guests and receptions accommodating 500 in the dramatic Rosenthal Pavilion on the 10th Floor of the Kimmel Center.     Catering services will provide whatever accoutrements you need to host a worry-free event. Our catering staff is ready to help create a menu to suit any occasion.                                                             Torch Club                                        Torch Club   New York University faculty, administrators, staff, alumni and NYU affiliates can gather socially over a meal, buffet selection or cocktail at the Torch Club .     The NYU community can enjoy a fine dining experience at the Torch Club. The restaurant combines a warm and inviting setting with elegant menus that features locally sourced seasonal selections.     In addition, the Torch Club provides catering services for any occasion, private or University-related. From arranging a business lunch to hosting a large gathering, the Torch Club can provide the perfect venue in the Tap Room, Dining Room or Meeting Rooms.                                                              Catering Washington Square                                        Top of the Square   Top of the Square Catering is the house caterer of the Kimmel Center—perfect for every occasion, from meeting refreshments to seated dinners with Executive Chef Peter Bove’s famous entrees. Top of the Square offers an entire menu of sustainable foods, and all produce is delivered daily. Services are available campus-wide.     Each catering event is setup with exquisite presentation and attention to detail. Top of the Square Catering services provides the NYU Community the opportunity to receive custom-made menus, floral arrangements, entertainment, tables, linens and specialty china patterns to compliment your affair exactly how you envision.     Top of the Square Catering also provides a Student Club Catering Menu ; available to NYU student groups featuring a myriad of choices from finger foods to dinner packages.                                                              Catering Brooklyn                                        Lackmann Culinary Services     Hosting an event, department meeting, simple breakfast or an upscale executive luncheon on the Brooklyn campus? NYU Dining and Lackmann Culinary Services offers full-service catering and an extensive selection that lets you design a crowd-pleasing menu from specialty buffets, meals-to-go, appetizers, and desserts. We pride ourselves on our ability to meet any need with style and creativity, assuring the success of your event.     NYU Dining - Brooklyn and Lackmann Culinary Services also provides a Student Catering Guide ; available to student groups featuring pizza parties, wings and things, international buffets or a complete party package.             Vending Management                                                         Vending Machine Locations                                        Working with Canteen Vending, NYU offers a wide variety of vending selections in our residential and academic locations. Canteen's Healthy Choice program provides many nutritionally balanced snacks and drinks. Canteen Vending ensures that all their vending machines are well maintained and regularly stocked. Campus Cash can be used to purchase snacks or beverages and is accepted at select vending machines throughout the NYU campuses.     Working with outside vendors and contractors, NYU Dining Services gets the most competitive bids so that the University community is well served in the most financially responsible way.                                                                                Ann Marie Powell       Director, Dining Services  212-998-4279   annmarie.powell@nyu.edu                                                                  Campus Services      Owen Moore                           NYU Dining Services      Ann Marie Powell                                           Vending Management      Ann Marie Powell                                                                      NYU Footer          Search      Directory      Campus Map      Events      Contact Us      Site Map      Copyright and Fair Use      Feedback         Unless otherwise noted, all content copyright New York University. Our dining program offers all members of the NYU community a variety of options ranging from traditional dining in cafes located throughout the NYU campus to newly-designed dining rooms. Aside from fulfilling day-to-day dining needs, Dining Services also creates special occasion events and international menus to celebrate holidays during the academic year.        The Torch Club      New York University faculty, administrators, staff, alumni and NYU affiliates can gather socially over a meal, buffet selection or cocktail at the NYU Torch Club . The Torch Club features elegant menus that are updated seasonally by the Chef.   The Torch Club also provides the highest quality catering services for any occasion, private or University-related. All members of the NYU community can arrange a business lunch to hosting a large gathering in the lovely Restaurant, Tap Room or Meeting facilities.
